to make something, especially a feeling,: with full force; at full speed
(of people) easy to control; willing to be influenced by somebody/something
in the middle of or during something, especially something that causes excitement or fear
severe physical or mental pain, difficulty or unhappiness
behaviour that is unreasonable, dangerous or silly and funny
to officially settle an argument or a disagreement between two people or groups
to find out the true or correct information about something
